welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kinnelon, a charming city known for its beautiful natural landscapes and warm community. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free Wi-Fi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Municipal Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Teterboro Airport serves as the primary hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Teterboro Airport caters to the needs of private jet owners and their guests.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines, including United Airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free Wi-Fi network for up to 30 minutes, after which they will be prompted to purchase a premium plan.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private flights and offers VIP services.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Main terminal serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Serves mainly Delta Air Lines and its partners.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Serves mainly American Airlines and its partners.

wifi.note: Limited free Wi-Fi access is available throughout the airport.
